tagline: One of the top webcomic titles in Japan (on the Piccoma platform)
description:
From the high seas to high society.
When the infamous pirate Rosetta gets poisoned to death, she wakes up in the body of noble lady Leah. Now, to avoid a second death, Rosetta must play the part of a noble and... get engaged?! But to whom? Could it be to the strange admiral who has suddenly come chasing after "Rosetta"?

comps: A grounded take on Beauty & the Beast
tagline: A memory-loss mystery with a romantic twist.
description: Angie enjoys an idyllic life of reading and embroidering on Cullinan Island. But everything changes when she's selected as the companion to Kylek, the enigmatic heir of House Blackwell. As their bond grows, extraordinary events unfold, unraveling Cullinan Island's long-kept secret.

tagline: An unconventional romance
description:
Trying new things is never easy.
Ohran Lim is an ex-boxer who never managed to go pro. Now, she spends her days working at the local convenience store, wondering where it all went wrong. But after she meets young couple Woon and Baram, she slowly begins to change her outlook on life. "I need to find what makes me happy."

tagline: YouTube Trailer
description:
"Devil, I don't want to marry him."
In hopes to escape a forced marriage, Giovinetta makes a wish to the devil to save her, but what she doesn't know are the consequences of her actions. Read the steamy story of a girl who just wants to be with the one man she is forbidden to love.

tagline: A rich/poor love story
description:
Fate entangles a prince and his butler.
Beta commoner Jooin has been in love with his childhood friend Licht for half an eternity, but their status separates them as the Alpha is sure to be married to an Omega instead. However, fate brings the two together once again - now as prince and his butler. Can love truly conquer all?

tagline:
YouTube Trailer #1
YouTube Trailer #2
Finding Camellia novel available on the Manta app
description:
Her life was nothing but lies.
Camellia was just 12 when she was taken away from her mother in the slums and forced to live as the son of an aristocratic family. But under the layers of secrets and lies, she never forgets. She continues to struggle to be her true self again, to reclaim the life of Camellia.

tagline: Wuxia-infused romance fantasy
description:
Revenge 13 years in the making.
To reverse a curse put on her and her brother, Yeju has been searching for the shaman responsible for 13 long years. When the heir to the Tiger Clan, Heewu, sets Yeju up in order to steal her sword, the two realize that they have the same objective. But is this new man friend or foe?

title_name_en: The Tale of the Frost Flower
tagline: An imperial scandal and a shattered first love.
description: Sabi is secretly in love with her childhood friend Yusu and wishes to marry him. But the day after her coming-of-age celebration, she finds herself embroiled in a scandalous rumor and suddenly engaged to the emperor's son. Will Sabi be able to clear her name and find her way back to her true love?

tagline: A fresh new take on the Odd Couple dynamic
description:
A minimalist meets a hoarder.
Jinsoo is a hoarder, Haeyoung a minimalist. But together, they make the perfect team! After meeting at a bakery as boss and employee, the two start visiting their customers' homes to help them organize their closets and rediscover themselves in the process.

tagline: Contemporary supernatural horror, in which a young man must save the most important person to him from the Grudge of an ancient god
description:
"Just stay alive, young master."
Sora has descended from the mountains to guard the sickly Jungha. The two have a set of rules to guide them: One, Sora decides what is considered an emergency. Two, Jungha must listen to Sora in an emergency. Three, Jungha must not bully Sora. Will they be able to stick to them?

comps: Star VS. the Forces of Evil, Owl House, Bunnies can be badass too., Fated to be killed by demons at the age of 16, Kihyun’s only hope now lies in luring out fiends at the beck and call of Ronnie, the Hare God, who seeks to reclaim his powers after falling from heaven. The catch? Mr. Cranky Bunny seems more interested in hunting demons than keeping Kihyun alive!
tagline: Fun, zany supernatural action
description:
COMPS
Star VS. the Forces of Evil, Owl House

comps: Lord of the Rings, Game of Thrones
tagline:
YouTube Trailer #1
YouTube Trailer #2
description:
Love is a fairytale. Or is it?
Stuttering lady Maximilian is forced into a marriage with Sir Riftan, but he leaves on a campaign after their wedding night. 3 years later, he triumphantly returns, ready to cherish her. All fairytales end with a wedding and a happily-ever-after. Their love began with a wedding — this is no fairytale.

comps: Heartstopper, Call Me By Your Name
tagline:
Dating while Famous
Sports Romance
description: Swim instructor Yeonsu’s been given his hardest challenge yet: teaching A-list actor Juhwan Cha how to swim. What happens when the actor proposes something entirely unexpected?

comps: Funny Farm, We Bought a Zoo
tagline: The delicious joys of living in the countryside
description: Tired of the hustle and bustle of city life, Minyeong decides to move back home — to the middle of nowhere. With delicious food, romance, and a bottle of good whiskey, she soon starts to rediscover the joys of living a simple life.

title_name_en: The Fallen Duke & the Knight Who Hated Him
comps: The King and I, Call Me By Your Name
tagline: Sleeping with the enemy... literally
description: After Duke Louison is given a second chance at life, he sets out to save the people he had so terribly failed by surrendering himself to the enemy. Yet little does he know that crossing paths with an enemy knight — the noble-hating Carlton — would become so... intimate. Things are about to get messy!

tagline: A first-person documentary about dieting and body image
description:
Loving yourself is never easy.
There are countless ways to diet. So why are there no ways to quit? An intimate, cheerful tale of growth about a woman who has long struggled with body image issues and eating disorders.

tagline: A sweet coming-of-age story
description:
There is wonder to be found in books.
After returning home from a horrible first day at a new school, Julie is distraught to find that her mother's given away her favorite childhood book. Determined to get her comfort object back, she seeks out a used bookstore where she not only finds her book... but also a new world of possibilities!

tagline: This SLIDING DOORS drama could easily be adapted to focus on contemporary American girls of different economic classes swapping lives
description:
A maid swaps lives with a lady...
Set in the Japanese colonial period, a young girl is gifted a maidservant who looks just like her on her 8th birthday. The fate of the two children entwines as they each carve out their own destiny, surpassing obstacles such as status and gender, education and culture, and ethnicity and race.

tagline: A prince falls for a beautiful lie
description: Sangyul's been living a lie since birth. Everyone thinks he's the feeble, omega son of Jodong Pharma's President Han, but in reality, he's as normal as can be. So what's he to do when Korea's sole alpha, Prince Reok, proposes an interesting deal? Will he finally get the ordinary life he so desires?

tagline: Can love overcome incompatibility?
description: Despite the fact that business major Dojae is far from his type, Euntak falls in love at first sight. Truth be told, the two of them couldn't be any more different. But after a one-night stand with Dojae, Euntak faces a new dilemma...

title_name_en: The Deviless' Impression of a Princess
tagline: Can a bad girl make good?
description:
How to catch a knight? Impersonate a princess!
Lilith the Demon Queen longs to meet a knight like the ones she reads about in books. In order to lure one to her castle, she kidnaps a princess and waits. Much to her delight, the knight who shows up is exactly as she pictured him! She decides to disguise herself as the princess to capture his heart...

tagline: “Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate”
description:
He suddenly looks like a snack!
Just dumped, Eva turns to the comfort of food to heal her broken heart. But little does she know that her childhood friend, James, may just be the comfort she needs! Can James help Eva cook up a cure for heartbreak? Or will it be a recipe for disaster?

tagline: Action and adventure elevate this romance fantasy
description:
How far are you willing to go for love?
Not a day goes by that Eve doesn't wish to reunite with her childhood friend, Mikha. But three years later, when she learns that Mikha has become a cursed sorcerer who leaves only death in his wake, Eve must embark on a journey to save not only the man she loves but also the world as she knows it.

tagline: YouTube Trailer
description:
"If you're not my rival, why do I feel this way?"
Blessed with both beauty and brains, it was only natural for Johann to be the top student at the Academy — that is, until Elena Evoy appears. To make things worse, she seems completely unfazed by his charms, shattering his self-esteem. So why can't he stop thinking about her?

tagline: A Gen Z take on four friends living in the city
description:
Start caring for your living space!
Creating the perfect home doesn't have to cost an arm and a leg. Follow four women with strong personalities as they share with you their tips and tricks on DIY interior decorating. Learn how to look after both your living space and yourself in order to take back control of your life.

tagline: A dying princess and the knight who loves her
description: Princess Kirona has Tetra Fever, a disease that eventually results in death. To save herself, she travels to the East in search of a cure and meets Jade Eclipse, a mercenary with a handsome face and mysterious past. Will Kirona find a way to survive? Or is Jade fated to love a doomed princess?

tagline: A wild secret-identity romance fantasy.
description: To escape her brothel, Grizz Benedict is offered a fake identity as the Virenhague family's daughter. Her new "brother" showers her with gifts, and soon he attempts to give himself to her entirely. Despite feeling that this will all end in disaster, Grizz wonders if she ought to just accept it...

tagline: An isekai with a stunning, magical world
description:
He who bears the mark of the true Holy King. 
Servant Sion wants nothing more than a quiet life. Instead, he's betrayed by the one he trusts and tortured by the jealous "Holy king" siennas for bearing stigmata, a holy mark, on his back. But rather than dying, Sion's mind is reborn in the body of Siennas on his coronation day 5 years earlier...

title_name_en: Disobey the Duke if You Dare
tagline: YouTube Trailer
description:
You must never see the duke’s face.
After her second husband's death, Lily is forced into a third marriage by her father. Her new husband is rumored to be a monstrous warmonger, but to Lily's surprise, the Duke turns out to be a kind man and husband. There's just one catch... she must never see his face.

tagline: A comedy about an important issue
description: After relying on fast food and alcohol for too long, a health scare pulls our heroine into the world of "Zero Waste." But her attempts to improve her own health, as well as the health of the planet, start causing issues with the people around her. Is living a zero waste life really possible?

comps: How to Train Your Dragon, Frozen
tagline: An outcast heroine must raise a dragon, changing her fate.
description:
Did you just imprint on me?!
After dying from overwork, Noa ends up possessing the body of Eleanora, the villainess from a novel. Noa simply wants to lead a peaceful life and tries not to interfere with the original story. That is, until a baby dragon that’s meant to imprint on the heroine imprints on her instead...

tagline: YouTube Trailer
description:
Once an enemy, now a husband?
Femme fatale Veronica is sentenced to death for obsessing over the prince. With her life now in danger, she boards a ship to escape, unaware that it belongs to her archnemesis, the alluring Prince Halid. He agrees to help her, but only on the condition that she pretends to be his wife!

title_name_en: Arpeggio on the Surface of the Sea
tagline:
College Romance
Light and romantic
description: After developing stage fright, pianist Suyeon Cha seeks comfort in the arms of strangers. One such stranger is Haesu Shin, whom he becomes partners with for a group project. Haesu is sweet, cheerful, and makes no secret of his feelings for Suyeon, which Suyeon returns, but is also overwhelmed by...

comps: Heartstopper, To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before, Wanna fake-date for 4 weeks?, Dojun's life at college is off to a perfect start! Until he meets his roommate, Jaehee, a high school friend whom he may have ghosted. Jaehee claims he's over their unresolved past, but after an accident resulting in a fractured wrist, he makes Dojun a proposition...
tagline: One of the top BL titles across all of Southeast Asia (on the Comico platform)
description:
COMPS
Heartstopper, To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before

tagline: First-person narrative about the world of stand-up
description:
Welcome to the world of stand-up!
What's the anatomy of a joke? Should you cross the line between funny and offensive? How do top comedians hone their craft, and how did stand-up start in the first place? Dive into the world of humor with your first ever webtoon guide to stand-up comedy!

tagline: A quirky story that’s sweet and saucy
description:
I feel better when I'm on the pole!
Despite the taboo surrounding it, pole dancing is one of the most vigorous physical exercises out there. Though initially self-conscious about her new hobby, our protagonist learns to love her own body and herself through the art of pole dancing. So, then... Shall we dance?

tagline: Is it safe to fall in love with a stranger?
description: After losing her family to the revolt, noblewoman Lysithea hires Taron, a strapping young broker, to help her flee the kingdom. But when a heavy snowstorm strands the bickering pair in an eerie abandoned mansion, Lysithea has no choice but to rely on her new partner. What dangerous romance awaits them?

tagline: A fresh take on vampires
description:
You're the monster that can save me from this hell.
As soon as she comes of age, Linnea is married off to an aristocrat in exchange for a sizeable dowry. She finds solace in Aleksis, her new husband's son. However, terrible secrets surrounding the family come to light as soon as they cross the forbidden line. Will she be able to escape from this hell?

tagline: A journey that chronicles an epic love
description:
It's more than just coincidence.
Young Paljae drifts to the isle at world's end to be taken in by Munryeong, a hermit with a mysterious past. But when Paljae begins to waste away in the sun-bathed climate, Munryeong takes his little companion on a journey to the cold north that uncovers their forgotten past encounter.

tagline: A spicy romance contrasted with an Elmore Leonard-style crime thriller
description: One day, top counterterrorism agent Hana Lee receives news of her twin brother's passing. Unable to accept the death of her only living relative, she sets out to uncover the truth. Along the way, she gets tangled up with the mysterious Eunseong Yoo and the cold-blooded mafia boss, Giulio Parenti.

comps: The Girl with All the Gifts, Bird Box, Children of Men
tagline: An eco-horror where “zombie” Plastikos lust for plastic… but are still deadly to flesh and blood people.
description: When Jaehyun notices a bizarre phenomenon, he is rather dismissive of it. That is, until he discovers that his own long-term girlfriend Seoeun is suffering the same affliction. What in the world is going on, and why is everyone so desperate to eat plastic, at the expense of their very lives?

comps: Little Demon, What We Do in the Shadows
tagline:
A quirky comedy that would be perfect for an animated adult comedy or a live action comedy
Grounded supernatural adventure adds to the fun
description:
An accidental deal with the devil goes awry.
Veterinary student Yoon Ha discovers he has a fear of blood! To solve his problem, he makes a deal with the demon Samael in exchange for his soul, which goes terribly wrong. Now Yoon must help Samael recover his demonic powers... but evil spirits keep showing up, lusting after Yoon's body?!

tagline: Friendship is harder than it looks – but it’s never been cuter!
description:
A cat, a corgi and lots of fun!
Best friends for life: The story of a sardonic cat and an eager corgi. Follow their adventures as they learn how to live together, care for each other, and welcome new members into their lives!

comps: America's Sweethearts, The Devil Wears Prada
tagline: Fake dating Korea's hottest star
description: Being the manager of a popular actress is not very fun. Hyojung is stuck on the sidelines running errands for Yeonkyung, the popular actress who also happens to be Hyojung's cousin. But Yeonkyung makes an interesting proposal: “Help me date Seungyun, Korea’s hottest star.” What will happen when Hyojung and Seungyoon begin a fake relationship to get back at Yeonkyung? They're just faking it, no emotions involved... right?

tagline: A multi-generational heartfelt comedy
description:
Diary of a 20-something caretaker.
After spending her entire life working in the fields and taking care of her family, Granny's been diagnosed with dementia — and I’m her new caretaker. Now I’m starting to understand the hardships of the women who’ve grown up in the patriarchy.

tagline: Mythological worldbuilding adds interest to this love story
description:
What do you think you're doing with that axe?!
When the stag god, Cheongyeon, is rescued from a hunter by a woodsman named Mooksan, he knows Mooksan is just what he's missing up in heaven. But little does Cheongyeon know, Mooksan is no ordinary woodsman...

title_name_en: I Work at a Witch's Mansion
tagline: A soapy supernatural story that combines a playful aesthetic and a spooky atmosphere
description:
"What did I get myself into?!”
Elena works at a theater troupe as a cleaner with big dreams of making it on stage. But when the troupe is disbanded overnight, she’s forced to find a new job. Luckily, she stumbles upon an old mansion where she’s hired as a maid. But there’s something strange about the madam of the house...

tagline:
The hilarious high concept of a statue coming to life to be the perfect suitor to a woman scorned
ALTHOUGH THE COMIC IS SET IN A NEBULOUS “PERIOD” SETTING, IT WOULD BE EASY TO MAKE THIS STORY CONTEMPORARY.
description:
One wrong wish and now I have two husbands?!
After finding a wish-granting statue, Renea jumps at the chance to turn her love life around. However, what was supposed to be a wish to make her cheating husband fall in love with her ends up as a wish to marry the hunky statue instead! Can Renea pull off having two husbands without getting caught?

comps: Heartstopper, Outer Banks, The Farewell, A story about living with loss., Going on with our lives after having lost someone is always painful. What does it mean to move on without forgetting them? This is a story about survivors struggling to find happiness within their guilt and grief.
tagline:
OWNED BY
MANTA/RIDI
description: A deep character study

tagline: With videogame adaptations hotter than ever, this is the story of a female lead caught in a videogame fighting for her survival
description:
Jaehee is a zillionaire in a gacha game!
Obsessed with the clicker game Infinite Diamonds for over a year, Jaehee finally reaches the ultimate in-game achievement — only to suddenly find herself in the RPG gacha game Terrarium Adventure! Why was she pulled into the game, and how can she get out? For now, she has no choice but to explore!

tagline: A perfect blend of crime, thriller and lesbian romance
description:
3 women, 1 messy love triangle!
Geumhee has always felt safe and comfortable working at her best friend Taeri's company. But everything changes when Bora comes and stirs things up — Taeri suddenly goes into hiding, and Geumhee gets thrown into the middle of... a police investigation and a messy lesbian love triangle!

tagline: Can Yuli save the world AND her love life?
description:
Can Yuli save humanity?!
Eaters — intelligent creatures from outer space that prey on Earthlings. Problem is, even though they look like humans, no one knows how to talk with them! Enter Yuli, the only known human to date who can communicate with the Eaters.

tagline: A wild isekai
description:
Find your dad, or face death - again.
After working herself to death, Professor Jaehee Cheon is reincarnated as a princess in a fantasy novel. Now, she must find her father from the four gorgeous candidates before her to find her happy ending. Will Jaehee be able to survive in her second life?

tagline: Time travel to prevent the apocalypse. Massive stakes with a great “everyman” lead.
description:
A massive asteroid is about to hit earth!
Humanity has failed to stop a giant asteroid from plummeting into Earth, and life as we know it has ended. An ordinary Korean office worker named Cheolsu is somehow given the chance to go back in time and prevent this catastrophe from ever happening. Does he have a chance?

title_name_en: The Forgotten Princess Just Wants Peace
tagline: A romance fantasy that turns the wish-fulfillment aspect of the genre on its head, focusing on a princess who doesn’t want to be royalty
description:
I'm the daughter of a Duke?!
While locked up in a prison cell, Eluana Vita awakens her alchemy powers and later finds out she's the daughter of a Duke! However, she's in for a rude awakening when she realizes the royal life isn't what she thought it'd be. Join Eluana on her journey to find the peaceful life she's always wanted.

tagline: A high concept elevating a gay romance
description:
If only I could be the one to reach you...
After an ankle injury dashes Hoon’s hopes of becoming a basketball star, he begins to see a timer in the sky. He believes it’s a countdown to the day he dies, until he discovers one day that his classmate Haedam can see it too...

title_name_en: The Demon Queen Has a Death Wish
tagline: A romance fantasy that breaks all the rules
description:
I wanted to die.. until I met him.
After breaking a treaty and waging war against the demons, humanity suffered a crushing defeat. Civilization has been destroyed, and demons are now the ruling species. At the very top, above all others, is the Demon Queen. But the Demon Queen is tired. In fact, she only has one wish: to die!

tagline: A new signature horror
description: Mr. Kim has lived alone ever since his wife mysteriously fell off a cliff. Her body was never found, and Mr. Kim believes that she is still out there. On a dark, pouring day, Mr. Kim revisits the site of her presumed death. On his search for her, he comes across an old man that creates scarecrows for "souls".

tagline: Music and passion collide
description:
I'll be the one to save you this time.
While suffering from PTSD, Roman Brennon searches for pianist Yuri Jung's album. He finds it in a small store, but it's sold before Roman can buy it. It is here that he runs into Yuri himself, who has fallen ill and can no longer play the piano. Yuri once saved Roman, but can he return the favor?

tagline: High art and the human heart collide
description:
Love and art go hand in hand.
Sunah, the daughter of a rich family, is trying to transform her mother's failing art museum. She soon encounters art conservator Inho, who disagrees with her methods. As he tries to convince her that restoration is often better than a complete do-over, the two begin to fall in love.

tagline: Fighting the system!
description:
For those fighting discrimination.
Why does systemic discrimination go unnoticed? Who are the people who stand to benefit from hatred? What if remaining neutral ultimately means you're siding with the oppressors? Follow this story about discrimination, equality, and the fight for justice through the eyes of four different characters!

tagline:
K-Pop
Seeing stats / knowing the future
Romance
description:
Falling star to superstar!
Yusung is destined to give up on his dream of becoming an idol and spend the rest of his days working as his crush's manager. That is, unless he reinvents his approach to being a trainee! What are these mysterious skill bars only he can see? Could they be the key to avoid a painful future and making his dreams for his creative and romantic life come true?

tagline: Isnelda is stuck between her first love and a hero.
description: After suddenly becoming an orphan, Isnelda is sent to live with her cold relatives until she reaches adulthood and can gain her inheritance. Yet upon becoming an adult, a benefactor returns to Isnelda's life, opening her eyes to a world of wealth, greed, lust, and... magic? What could go wrong?

tagline: A genuinely hilarious genre-bending romcom
description:
From archenemies to fictional lovers!
Taeyeon is horrified when she finds herself co-teaching an after-school writing class with her college nemesis, Yongjin. Little does she realize that the worst is yet to come. They're in for a wild ride when they get sucked into a novel written by 8-year-olds, where absurdity becomes reality!

tagline: A magical comedy about travel and reinvention
description:
Celebrating failure.
Feeling like a failure after giving up her lifelong dream, Kkangjang travels to Iceland, a country where failure is embraced — and also one of the most expensive places in the world. Can she make her journey work on a shoestring budget? Follow along as she travels with the help of a guardian spirit!

comps: John Wick, The Diplomat, Jack Ryan, Ghosted
tagline: A dramatic action thriller with a hint of comedy and romance
description:
Hale Windsor was a renowned hitman until he is betrayed and loses the love of his life. With nothing left to live for, he begins a war of revenge on the very organization he used to work for. That is, until he meets Marine, a girl who brings color back into his black and white existence.
But things are more complex for Marine, an unexceptional middle-manager who just learned her most competent-yet-challenging employee KILLS PEOPLE during his lunch hour!
The two end up an unlikely team to take on a global cartel, with a government sanction to kill.

tagline: A compelling high concept of fantasy intrusions disrupting our modern world
description:
I can help you kill your friends.
Strange dungeons have started appearing all over the world and wreaking havoc. Yiseon, a guy with the power to rebuild cities, witnesses his friends being turned into the undead. Hyeon, a powerful hunter, comes to him with an interesting proposition. Yiseon has no choice but to accept his offer.

tagline: A wild social experiment makes a woman re-prioritize her life
description:
No new clothes for a whole year?!
After finding out her rent is going to increase, Jina Yoon decides it's time for her to move. But wait... She's broke because she spent all her money on clothes! Join Jina on her year-long challenge to not buy any new clothing. Will she be able to end her addiction to shopping?

tagline: A reincarnated heroine navigates a dangerous love triangle, doing anything to survive, no matter what!
description: I've died and been reincarnated as the villain of a romance novel! In order to avoid the hideous fate that awaits me, I've righted her wrongs and even gotten engaged. I should be home free, but strange things have started happening ever since the heroine appeared. Why won't her fiancé leave me alone?

tagline: A romance with societal rules straight out of an Edith Wharton novel
description:
Would you sacrifice your honor to marry a Duke?
In order to save her family from ruin, Chloe Verdier must find a groom for her sister, Alice. She soon runs into the handsome but arrogant Duke Tisse who makes a proposal that could save them. When Alice flees with a mysterious man, Chloe must seek out the Duke in the biggest gamble of her life.

tagline: Docuseries about investment
description:
Invest like a pro!
The number of individuals investing in stocks is growing daily. But for every brilliant success story, there are countless failures. It isn't easy for small investors to succeed in the ruthless world of stock trading. Still, it isn't impossible — if you can just think like a quant!

tagline: Lady of Vengeance and the returned Prince
description: Cecylia Saryan, liege to the order of Hearthtread and heir to the Dukedom after her father's sudden death, discovers a young boy hidden in his legacy — the Crown Prince Ethan, thought to have drowned 5 years ago. Will Cecylia be able to keep her House intact while helping Ethan reclaim his throne?

tagline: K-Content for kids
description:
Follow Haechi's royal adventure!
Legendary creature Haechi lives in Gyeongbokgung Palace. Endearingly round and soft, he has oodles of affection for everyone he meets. What kind of mischief will he get up to today? And what joy will he bring to the ladies of the palace? Follow Haechi's high jinks as he brightens everyone's day!

comps: Red, White and Royal Blue, Two Weeks Notice
tagline: Love is like a punch to the face.
description: Sunwoo is a perfectly ordinary guy with a perfectly ordinary life. So it's no wonder he's enamored by his coworker Taemoon. The guy's handsome, charming, and a total ten! But when Sunwoo catches a glimpse of his crush's texts one day, he realizes that their days at work will be anything but ordinary.

title_name_en: Juliet, We're Not in Kansas Anymore!
tagline: The course of true love never did run smooth – especially for a high school girl with the tragically romantic name of Juliet!
description: As far as high school junior Juliet Holiday is concerned, her real tragedy is sharing a name with such a famous character. Then along comes a charming British transfer student named none other than Romeo. Did fate lead him to this small Kansas town? Pray tell, who's the real Romeo in Juliet's story?

tagline: A heartfelt story about an important social issue
description:
The journey of overcoming abuse.
Haram is running away from home for the third time. After struggling with life in a dormitory, she's decided to stay at a shelter for homeless adolescents. Haram is worried about living with others while managing her depression and trauma... but she's determined to find happiness.

comps: An LGBTQ+ version of A Business Proposal
tagline: A spritely LGBTQ+ workplace romance!
description: Youngwon yearns for true love, but his overbearing nature always leads to failed relationships. Lately, he finds himself clashing with his polar opposite, Hyunwoo, at work. However, things heat up when they go on a business trip together. Will these sparks of enmity turn to love?

tagline:
An impressive blend of mystery, romance and supernatural elements
An intriguing setting that adds atmosphere and international appeal
description: When Gabriele is forced to move away from his city life to a rural town in Italy, he is determined to hate everything about Umbra. The town's so old, and everyone his age looks miserable. He's never gonna adjust, and he's gonna miss his big city life. Except, there's a mystery here — one of love.

tagline: A strange love story
description:
A hot guy appears with drugs?!
Plagued by health issues, Boni Min is basically a walking hospital. Then, one day a mysterious guy appears. He moves in, gives her medicine, and explains them all to her. Turns out the information is quite useful! Soon enough, Boni finds herself falling for his cold-but-warm-hearted charms...

tagline: Can love bloom in a wasteland?
description: A captive princess doomed to become a living sacrifice, and a savage, murderous prince intent on overtaking his three older brothers and seizing the throne. Caught up in a deadly dance with destiny in a brutal, drought-stricken desert, can they overcome their grim fates… and perhaps, find love?

tagline: A medical drama mixed with a supernatural soap – a truly original idea
description:
A dangerous love affair with a werewolf.
Single mother Olivia finds Damian dying on the streets and takes him home. Before long, the two are sharing a passionate kiss. Damian soon realizes the side effects of the drug suppressing his werewolf instincts vanish when he is with her. Now he must find a way to keep her around, no matter the cost.

tagline: A great, grounded high concept erotic thriller
description:
Is this my second chance at life?
After waking up from a 3-month coma, Nina doesn’t remember anything about herself. The only clue she has is a music box with her name written on it. 
Gradually, fragments of her memories come back to her. Among them is a memory of a guy who gave her the mysterious music box. Who is he? Is he the key to recovering Nina’s missing memories – and the secret about the assault that nearly took her life?

tagline: Is Madelyn's cursed husband's fate up to her?
description: Madelyn's husband Ian was left broken after the war, and in turn, made her life a living hell. Fleeing her doomed marriage, she meets a tragic end. But when she opens her eyes, she finds herself at 17 again. The war has yet to start, and Madelyn can still change her fate. But what about Ian?

tagline: One of the top webcomic titles in Japan (on the Piccoma platform)
description: Though Elise is forced to live in isolation, she doesn't feel alone thanks to her ability to communicate with animals. That is until she's sent off to marry the ruler of what's known as the Land of the Barbarians! What adventures, and dangers, await Elise in this strange, new world?

tagline: Girlpower and soccer for the win!
description:
The power of women playing soccer.
Eonam is unexpectedly invited to join the local women's soccer team. With bad group experiences in the past, she isn't sure if soccer is for her. But after that first kick of the ball and getting to know the other women on the team, Eonam's life begins to change for the better.

comps: Heartstopper, Just One of the Guys
tagline:
Secret Identity
Aspirational
description: Struggling to pay his mother's hospital bills, Hakyung receives an offer: the fees will be taken care of. The catch? In exchange, he must pretend to be a girl he once knew in order to deceive the chairman of a powerful company. It's going well until Yoonsung, the chairman's grandson, appears...

comps: The Worst Person in the World or Shrinking
tagline: A story of self-discovery
description:
I'm learning to love myself.
Hyeonjung, a physiotherapist, dreams of drawing comics despite her family constantly putting her down. Her boyfriend Seulgi is a successful cartoonist, but he can't stand it when he finds himself in a rut while Hyeonjung matures and evolves. The two find themselves on the way to splitting up...

tagline: An empowered female lead
description:
Could love bedazzle like a gem?
For Melisa, the best gemologist in Annabel, no love can outshine a gem. She'd rather remain single and devoted to her career! But just when she thinks she has it all figured out, Duke Lewis Winterfelt, the most eligible bachelor in all the kingdom, asks for her hand in marriage — through a contract!

title_name_en: My Sweet Enemy, Thy Name is Husband
tagline: The ultimate enemies-to-lovers romance
description:
My husband, my nemesis. Till death do us part.
Canach Riadon — a slave who rose to emperor and the man I wed in my first life. Yet our ill-fated marriage left my family murdered and my homeland destroyed at his hands. Now given a second chance, I vow to succeed in this political marriage and save all I love... Or will his love save me first?

tagline: YouTube Trailer
description:
“I taste her on your lips.”
On the night of our fourth wedding anniversary, I witnessed my husband having an affair. "I love you," he told my twin sister as he laid on top of her. This can't just end easily with a divorce. No, I'll make them pay for this.

tagline: An unlikely love story
description:
He bought me for 50 sacks of rice.
Soongap is nearly beaten to death by his master when friendly giant Bongchun buys him and saves his life. Bongchun's blind mother is delighted, believing her son has finally brought home a bride. And the more Bongchun treats Soongap like his darling bride, the more things get heated...

tagline: A wonderful island world to explore through a romantic epic
description:
Can love transcend all boundaries?
The 200-year long peace in Mokrin's island tribe is broken when the warlike Gyui-heols arrive to demand open borders. What's more, Eonyeong, the son of their chieftess, falls hopelessly in love with Mokrin. Now it's up to her — will she spurn his affection or marry him for the sake of her people?

tagline: A fantasy epic of twisted fates and forbidden love.
description: As a prophetess, Noemi can see the futures of those she touches. Yet sadly, as the wife of a god, she sees only death in her own fateful future. But then, a sudden kiss with an unruly merchant brings a vision of life. Could he be Noemi's key to survival? Or will she be unable to escape her destiny?

comps: Monte Python and the Holy Grail
tagline: Hilarious spoof of fairytale stories, asking the obvious question – what must all of those bath-adverse royals smell like?
description:
Marry me, and we can bathe twice a day!
Unwashed hair, dirty fingernails, and the sickening stench of body odor mixed with perfume! Nadia is horrified to wake up in a romance fantasy novel where bathing is abhorred. Her only hope lies in Duke Cartane, the one man who doesn't stink. Will he help her get her squeaky-clean happy ending?

tagline: An empowered female lead finds her perfect himbo
description:
Let me be your trophy.
With her wealth, status, and godlike strength, Duke Serena has it all — everything but her heart, that is. Enter Ricardo, a charming prince who claims to know its whereabouts and proposes an alliance that would benefit them both. Is this mysterious suitor really the key to regaining her lost heart?

comps: A fantasy version of Donnie Darko
tagline: REMOVE Imagine being kin to your sworn enemy.
description: Killed in battle while defending his country, Bern wakes up in the body of the enemy prince, Kalian, with a unique opportunity to prevent an upcoming war. But between taming an abusive half-brother and surviving his mother's deadly web of intrigue, sweet revenge seems to slip further beyond his grasp at every turn.

tagline: Rivals becomes lovers as they fight over an inheritance
description:
May the best heir win!
Florist Riella never meant to catch the attention of Duchess Horssen with her shining flowers, and she certainly didn't mean to inherit her entire fortune! So when the enraged Grand Duke Hann appears before her to claim possession of the inheritance, what is she to do? Can she defend her newfound title?

tagline: An estate to manage, a lover to tame.
description: Following the gruesome death of his family, mage Eyra inherits the Solath Estate and becomes a lord overnight, only to discover that he can suddenly see the stats of everyone he meets. Enter Yanu, a dashing jack-of-all-trades who seems hell-bent on distracting him from his newfound duties...

tagline: Tutorial NPC here to save the day!
description: We've all read those stories—the protagonist has a terrible accident but then comes back as a key character in a fantasy novel— and so has Lucian. Imagine his surprise when he gets into one then is reincarnated in a fantasy game he's played as... an NPC! He's supposed to change the fates, but how?!

tagline: A take-charge female protagonist in an exciting fantasy world.
description: Alicia Melfont vows to restore the former glory of her house after the Dark God's agent massacres her family. But when a mysterious book reveals that she's only a supporting character meant to die for the true protagonist of the story, Alicia decides she won't let some silly book determine her fate.

tagline: An epic fantasy with unique worldbuilding
description:
In the storm sleeps a giant...
When the unfaithful crown prince calls off their marriage, Lady Kyrie is exiled to a remote cottage. On the way, she discovers a hidden village while avoiding a snowstorm. It's there "the end" is awakened... and it's starting to become obsessed with her.

tagline: A romantic romp in an inspiring place
description:
Come heal and find love in Jeju!
3rd-generation Korean-American Brenda falls in love with Jeju Island while researching its female divers. She decides to take the plunge and move to the island with her husband. There, she dives deep into Jeju's history and culture while healing, growing, and building friendships along the way.

comps: The Incredibly True Adventure of Two Girls in Love
tagline: A sweet lesbian romance
description:
I'm not clingy... I'm just in love!
Graduate student Songah thinks her girlfriend Yoosung is the cutest girl in the world. It doesn't matter if she's actually more sophisticated than adorable; Yoosung is number one in her heart! So how is she supposed to react when some hot childhood friend suddenly enters the mix?!

tagline: Fun, visual, accessible science show
description:
Everyday science made fun!
Think science is boring or intimidating? Think again! Learn about how nitrogen revolutionized global food production, how plastic started with a billiard ball before taking over the world, the hackers who created the information age, and more!

comps: Notting Hill, Heartstopper, Call Me By Your Name
tagline: A gay romp that dives into the vagaries of fame.
description:
An A-list star has a crush.. on me?
Lucifer, a member of the obscure idol group Sweet Devils, dreams of making it big. His one claim to fame — an accidental pants-ripping on air — leads to a chance encounter with A-list star Kwonjun Kang. Turns out, Kwonjun has been harboring an intense crush on Lucifer. What will happen when an unexpected one-night stand leads to an ambiguous romance? How will this A-list star and D-list idol navigate their relationship?

tagline: He’s using her to kill her brother (because her brother’s actions led to the death of his sister). It’s a callous lie… until it turns to love. Truly one of the most compelling, dynamic soapy crime thrillers.
description: Woohyun lives life on autopilot as a high-ranking member of a crime syndicate. But all that changes when his sister, conned by her boyfriend, commits suicide. Wanting revenge, Woohyun targets the boyfriend's sister, Yoohwa. But as their lives collide, she slowly weakens his resolve... and his heart.

tagline: Nature adventure and survivalist thriller
description: Animal behaviorist Hyunwoo's love for penguins drives him all the way over to Antarctica. Once there, however, he encounters a series of mishaps and soon discovers that surviving in the harsh cold is no easy feat. Will Hyunwoo be able to conduct his research and return to Korea in one piece?

comps: Lone Wolf & Cub, Game of Thrones
tagline: A unique story of a tough female guardian and a chosen one
description:
You're still precious to me.
After losing her family in a demon attack, Rosha is reborn as the 777th most powerful magic knight in the Golden Dawn Society. To avenge her family, she trains hard and rises through the ranks against the odds. Then, she is tasked with protecting little Joshua, who is said to be the Child of God...

tagline: A workplace comedy with a fun conspiratorial engine
description:
To fry or not to fry, that is the question!
After an innocent favor blows up in his face, Hachan is desperate to start afresh. His last remaining hope is to infiltrate a mysterious fried food shop to reveal its secret, which will guarantee him a job as a reporter. But his investigation soon takes him down a completely unexpected path...

comps: Daenerys & Khal Drogo in Game of Thrones
tagline: Memory loss and power dynamics add spice to this romance fantasy.
description: If anyone discovers that slave master Ananse has lost her memory, she will be killed. So to save herself, she ropes in Solteo, a slave who hates her beyond compare. Her proposal? "Help me uphold my old image, and you'll be freed." His reply? "I'll make you regret ever requesting that, my master."

tagline: A supernatural thriller with LGBTQ+ leads.
description:
A human and a beast living under one roof.
Chaewool's heart shatters after the death of his boss, Chaehun, whom he had long admired in secret. But soon after, Chaehun returns. Does that mean he's alive? Something is amiss... The perfect facade of the boss Chaewool knew remains intact, but who is this cold, serpentine beast lurking within?

title_name_en: My Second Life as an Idol
comps: Star, Daisy Jones & the Six, Heaven Can Wait
tagline: With K-Pop exploding globally, this wish-fulfillment story takes audiences into the heart of K-Pop, as a washed up K-Pop “never was” dies… only to be put in the body of a younger hopeful (HEAVEN CAN WAIT style)
description:
From failed idol to hailed idol!
Flop idol Yongmin dies an unfortunate death but is given a second chance at life in the body of Ian, a super hot rich kid with a voice to match. At his side, he finds Jin, a mysterious soul tasked with guiding Ian to becoming a certified star. But is it really all smooth sailing from here?

tagline: Crime, justice and intrigue in a fantasy setting
description:
Don't believe a word she says.
Infamous jailbreaker Rosen Walker is finally being transferred to the Isle of Monte, the most notorious maximum security prison in the world. Her guard? None other than the beloved war hero of the empire himself — Ian Connor. Now he must unravel the truth. Is Rosen really a murderer? Or is there more to the story?

comps: Party of Five, This is Us
tagline: A sweet, soapy story that appeals to younger people, based on the “what if” factor, and parents, watching our young lead struggle with parenthood
description: 24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

tagline: LGBTQ+ romance blended with crime, action and thriller elements
description:
Someone's tattooing Xin in his sleep.
On the night of his birthday, Xin, the sole heir of the powerful Zhou family, reunites with Lau, his clan guardian, and confides in him about the mysterious tattoo forming on his back. Lau begrudgingly sets off to investigate this strange phenomenon, but what secrets will he uncover along the way?

tagline:
A comedy that has fun with our obsession with superheroes 
Selected as one of the 30 titles to be presented during the Asian Contents & Film Market : Busan Story Market (Held during the week of Busan Film Festival in October)
description:
Can’t be the superhero? Be the supervillain.
Welcome to Leaders Academy for the Superhumanly Gifted! As Korea’s most elite superhero institution, we aim to bring out the best in our students and encourage them to use their powers for the good of— Pardon? Class F, you say? Apologies, but we don't talk about Class F here.

tagline: The lure of low-level showbiz has never been stranger!
description:
I'm gonna become the madam!
Failed college entrance exams leave Heera feeling hopeless. That is, until she submits her "appeal" to a theater troupe at a folk village, catching the attention of the troupe's leader and changing her path forever. Now, Heera strives not to go to college, but to become the troupe's madam!

tagline: A mother/daughter story with heart and humor
description: A single mother who makes a living translating thriller novels, a teenage daughter just a bit on the unique side, and a cat with a penchant for tube treats. We might not be the perfect family, but we're doing our best in our own way!
